answer:
In BC, adults receive publicly funded (free) vaccines from local health units, most pharmacies and some doctors' offices. Find a local health unit here. Learn about vaccines recommended for adults here.
Immunization Nurse

question: I currently do not have health care provider even tho' twice hospitalized with pneumonia. Where may I avail myself of the immunization?
question_variation_0: can i avail myself of pneumonia immunization
question_variation_1: where may i avail myself of the immunizations?
